title: Forest Green bid for Charlton 'keeper Dillon Phillips
description: League Two side Forest Green have offered £60,000 to sign Charlton goalkeeper Dillon Phillips, according to Sky sources.
content: The 22-year-old has made 19 appearances for the Addicks after progressing through their youth ranks, including six in cup competitions this season.Essex-born Phillips has also spent time on loan at Whitehawk, Bishop's Stortford and Cheltenham Town.Forest Green, who have Port Vale in the FA Cup third round this weekend, have made four signings so far in the January window as they fight against relegation back to non-league football.They have landed Dayle Grubb from Weston Super-Mare, Gavin Gunning from this weekend's opponents Vale, Alex Whittle from York City and former Derby U21 Farrend Rawson.
